website_summaries.verdict: Baseball fans can now express their love for the sport on a daily basis with the Keds Champion Pennant. Fans need not utter a single word when they let the shoe’s baseball-inspired stitch detailing and retro design do all the talking while they go about their busy day. Despite its drawbacks in sizing and comfort, baseball aficionados were eager to put their hands on a pair due to its unique design and ability to showcase their passion for the sport.
pros: An overwhelming majority of the reviewers admired the Keds Champion Pennant's stylishly cute design
Thanks to its stitching design, some have found it fun while others think it is unique
Most purchasers commend this kick's design, as it works great as a summer shoe
A number of long-time fans shared that they were waiting for the Keds Champion Pennant reissue, and when it finally did, they ecstatically bought multiple pairs
Some baseball fans were delighted that they get tons of compliments every time they wear it out, especially during live games in the ballpark
This pair comes with two sets of laces for optional customization
Several shoe users regard the shoe's materials and construction to be of excellent quality
One added that his pair had lasted for 25 years
A few practical consumers liked the fact that the Keds Champion Pennant is easy to mix and match with most of their wardrobe
cons: Most reviewers expressed frustration regarding the kick's narrow built
Several shoe users noticed that shoe's sizing is a bit off
Some went into detail and said that the toe area feels wide enough but then sharply narrows towards the midfoot
Several wearers disclosed that the pair lacked cushioning, which caused discomfort when used for an extended amount of time

customer_reviews.title: Not normal
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-time Keds customer I had a pair of shoes like these about 20 years ago wanted to renew them bought these and was terribly upset at the quality compared to my old ones very cheaply made and so narrow that it was not made for your typical American feet. My feet started cramping as soon as I slipped them on they were so narrow it was ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: cowgirlcincy

customer_reviews.title: "Take Me Out To The Ballgame!"
customer_reviews.text: "Take me out with the crowd!" These are the quintessential baseball fan's shoes! The Keds fit is fine (I usually take an 8 1/2 C or 9 B shoe depending on the fit), and the interior is cushioned. The shoes look like they belong in a ballpark with their bright white leather and red thread baseball stitching. They even smell like a leather baseball! Thanks, Keds, for designing a fun accessory and brightening a rather bleak baseball season with the hope of wearing these shoes to a 2020 game.
customer_reviews.author: Responsible Critic at Large

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love these shoes!!!!!! they fit well and they're way too cute! comfortable too! would definitely recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Keds leather baseball sneakers. I wear a size 6 or 6 1/2 and ordered a size 6. They fit very comfortably as expected without socks. After they are broken in, they will fit well with socks. The white leather is soft and pebbled. The red stitching is just that - stitching - not printed on. The brown leather base patches on the heel and tongue are cute. Love that the shoes come with a second pair of laces in soft cloth (not leather or rawhide) “baseball glove” brown. Altogether, they are a fun and cute pair of sneakers for summer baseball games.
customer_reviews.author: Gardengirl24

customer_reviews.title: low at ankle bone, so no rubbing there
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Many tennis shoes are too heavy or too high at my ankle bone, so I cannot wear them. These are adoorable and fit perfectly. I would like to find others that are similar.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, not the most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are so cute and perfect for ballgames. The only thing I don't like is the stiffness of the leather. They rub too much on my heels even while wearing with socks and have given me blisters each time I've worn them.
customer_reviews.author: NigheanRua

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an earlier pair I had for aeons. Love these sneakers, they are so comfortable and make walking easier -- if that is possible. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Allegro 1001

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Have received lots of great comments. Better than the canvas because you can clean the leather easier. Fit is a little narrow and snug with socks, but I am expecting the leather will stretch a bit over time. Fit perfectly with stockings, and they are my new commute shoe (and sometimes I wear them all day at work!). Arch support is so-so. About what you expect with Keds, but wearing them all day and walking several blocks doesn't bother my feet. Very happy with these, especially as a big sports lover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe, just in time for the .playoffs
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is comfortable and looks good. Not like the poor quality newer canvas champions. They need to make the champions with the same quality from years back
customer_reviews.author: Sperry customer

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted these baseball Keds for years and am so happy to finally have a pair
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted these baseball Keds for years and am so happy to finally have a pair! The shoes run small - I normally wear a 6M, but purchased a 6.5M after trying on a comparable fabric Keds shoe. Although I know the leather will stretch some, but I wanted them to be comfortable from the get go. And they are comfortable! Even though there isn't much arch support, I can wear these all day long with no problems. Thanks Keds for bringing back this classic style!
customer_reviews.author: Wendalamax

customer_reviews.title: Love the classic look!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was exact sizing of other Keds I have. Love the leather & got a lot of compliments on the way to & at the baseball game. These didn't rub as much as some of my other new shoes do. Didn't feel like I had to break them in & didn't get blisters when I first wore them. I also wore these with the now show Keds socks.
customer_reviews.author: RBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a wide width 9.5 but figured I’d try this. Fir great. The only problem is the back is cut a little high and the stiff leather at the middle of the back rubbed the back of my heal. I need to either get some Tulles or a stick on heal protector
customer_reviews.author: kab

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t have any problems with the length or heel like some others
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but as a true size 9 in every other shoe, this one runs VERY narrow. Had to return for this reason. I didn’t have any problems with the length or heel like some others, but the width was poor. Thus two stars
customer_reviews.author: Trish Ann

customer_reviews.title: exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes and both time I've worn them I've gotten compliments. I'm an avid baseball fan so these shoes are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bradshaw50

customer_reviews.title: Darling!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I got tons of compliments! They are easy to clean and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ADCB

customer_reviews.title: Keds rock
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I get tons of compliments. High quality leather construction. Keds are the best.
customer_reviews.author: dmac

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are adorable! I have gotten so many complements on them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are adorable! I have gotten so many complements on them, and love wearing them to summer baseball games! They seem to run a tiny bit larger than expected, but not to the point of being problematic at all. Would highly recommend these for any baseball fans out there!
customer_reviews.author: Reader1002

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a day at the ballpark - completed my outfit perfectly. No blisters no rubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Loved them when I bought them in the 90's, love them just as much now!
customer_reviews.text: I originally owned these shoes, both in canvas and in leather, in the 90's, I LOVED them, and so did every one else. Compliments, compliments, compliments (and where did you GET those?!) I love Keds. I ordered a size 10 in the leather, plenty of room for my toes, if you're trying to decide between a 9.5 or 10...I'd try the 9.5. Great shoe, great look, great packaging! (I don't feel as though they 'run narrow' as other's may have stated.)
customer_reviews.author: S. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very pleased with them. Soft, quality leather. Nice baseball stitching. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: soups

customer_reviews.title: Love LOve LOVES them
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw someone with these while we were in Boston, and just had to have them . Luckily she found them here!! Love LOve LOVES them!!

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICELY made baseball shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought (2) pair. One size 7 and 7 1/2. The 7 1/2 was too long. I so wanted these to FIT, because I remember going to the Baseball Park when I was young and seeing the players with these on. So COOL!

customer_reviews.title: Baseball is great game!!!

customer_reviews.title: Yes

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were a bit snug at first but the ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a bit snug at first but the leather stretches after a few wearings.Overall, I get many compliments on them.

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and seem like the quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a gift for a friend. I haven’t given them to her yet. They are cute and seem like the quality is good. I think she’ll love them!
customer_reviews.author: McTigue M

customer_reviews.title: These Classic Keds Sneakers Should go Into the Baseball Hall of Fame
customer_reviews.text: Classic! My mother and I had these shoes probably 25 years ago. . . we are now 89 and 59 and when we saw them. . . we just had to get them again. Well made, comfortable and adorable. Just order a half size down. We get lots of compliments on them. . . so glad that Keds brought them back!
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes! They kind of feel like converses, where you can't reallllly go all day in them without your feet hurting. But they look great and are comfortable if you like converses :)

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are perfect to wear to games and are very comfortable for walking. Even though the arch support is good for the average foot, they could have more arch support for those with high arches. Otherwise, a perfect shoe!

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Classic KEDS/Van's style. No support and hard exterior. Very cute and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: so these are awesome for me for "cute" wear
customer_reviews.text: Huge baseball fan, so these are awesome for me for "cute" wear. My feet don't hold up like they used to, so can't wear all day without getting pretty sore. Pretty flat foot bed, but nothing my inserts don't help.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for the female baseball fan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow as expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to be narrow, as all Keds are on me. However, the fact that these are leather will allow for some stretch in the width. I'm anxious to try the "water in a zip-lock bag in the shoe in the freezer" trick.

customer_reviews.title: Of course, Keds provide average arch support. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course, Keds provide average arch support. I couldn't say no but there is always room for improvement. Having higher arches, I prefer to add extra support.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes! I was so disappointed that they were too small. I wore them once and had blisters. Definitely get a 1/2 size to a size larger than normal.

customer_reviews.title: There is a hard leather piece at the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a hard leather piece at the back of the heel and that piece rubs the skin off my ankle! Awful design! I've learned my lesson to NEVER order shoes online. These will be returned to manufacturer.

customer_reviews.text: I suggest ordering the size you normally would. It might seem a little snug, but the shoes form to your feet (just like Toms). The shipping was very fast. Overall I'm extremely pleased!! Love these shoes!

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Pennant Leather Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The baseball stitch detailing and a home plate embossed with k 1916 on the heel make this a classic shoe to celebrate america's favorite pastime. ortholite footbed, feminine last, 20 mm foxing
feature_bullets: Americana-inspired leather sneaker with baseball stitching featuring metallic eyelets and lace-up front
